description: A simple and Asian inspired vegan noodle dish.
name: Tofu Noodle Stir Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400g tofu, drained and cut into bite size portions
400g noodles, cooked as per packet instructions
1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a large non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the sesame oil.
Fry the tofu for 10 minutes while turning.
Add the onion and garlic to the pan and continue to fry for a further 4 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients to the pan and combine fully.
Cook the noodles as per packet instructions and then drain and add to the pan.
Cook everything together for 3 minutes while tossing before serving.
